attributes.action: grant an immediate pardon to Munir Hussain, a victim of our failed judicial system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under a just legal system, a thief would know that they violate another's home at their own peril, having given up any 'rights'.

Our police and courts must accept this principle.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
